segments.text: Can you believe this ? I locked my keys in the car , and I have to go to the airport to pick up my aunt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know ... Hey , do you think I could borrow your car for a few hours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but I really need it this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , could you drive me home ? I have spare keys there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , and Andy ? Do you have a quarter for the phone ? My wallet's in the car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that's it . Thanks . I really appreciate it .
segments.speaker: S2
